name: Sheppy
description:
Instructions:

Shepherd: WASD movement

Dog: Click to move

You have to try shepherd the sheep into the pen and then the shepherd can close the gate to end the level.

To close the gate the shepherd has to be right next to it then you will get a prompt to press 'E' to close the gate.

If there are some sheep outside the pen when the gate is closed the timer wont stop

My game for the Aotearoa Game Jam 2020

My first ever finished game :) Not much of a game but I'm so proud of it because you can play it and thats more than I can say about my 10,000 past attempts
